page.title: 12HAROLD HILL POLICE STATION
page.content: Harold Hill Police Station was built in 1955 and is manned by four sergeants, 34 policemen and one policewoman. There are six{home beat policemen and two{panda cars}(Austin Metro). In the Police Station there are 7 offices and two cells which are not in use. A policeman on duty carries with him a pair of{handcuffs, a notebook, {truncheon, a whistle and a radio. }A policeman's helmet is hard and has special straps to keep it on his head. The policemen sometimes go on special duties such as football matches, demonstrations, and royal visits.
